SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileEntry.userId = ?)
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) ORDER BY DLFileEntry.modifiedDate DESC
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (fileEntryId NOT IN( SELECT classPK FROM TagsAsset WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$] ))
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) WHERE (DLFileEntry.uuid_ = ?) AND (DLFolder.groupId = ?)

SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileEntry.userId = ?) ORDER BY DLFileEntry.modifiedDate DESC

( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] )

( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFolder WHERE [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] )

( SELECT folderId AS folderId, name AS name, title AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 'com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFileEntry' AS className FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT toFolderId AS folderId, toName AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 'com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFileShortcut' AS className FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.folderId = DLFileShortcut.toFolderId) AND (DLFileEntry.name = DLFileShortcut.toName) WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] ) ORDER BY title ASC

( SELECT folderId AS folderId, name AS name, name AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 'com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFolder' AS className FROM DLFolder WHERE [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT folderId AS folderId, name AS name, title AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 'com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFileEntry' AS className FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT toFolderId AS folderId, toName AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 'com.liferay.portlet.documentlibrary.model.DLFileShortcut' AS className FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.folderId = DLFileShortcut.toFolderId) AND (DLFileEntry.name = DLFileShortcut.toName) WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] ) ORDER BY title ASC
